text:
Im here for your voice
Im here by your choice
Find me in your plaza
Or next extravaganza
In 2 mins I''ll give you food
I'm here for your mood

prizes.name: ola-gift-card
prizes.description: No need to sober drive this weekend, because Ola has this one.
prizes.redeem_info: When you’re booking your ride in Ola. Copy this into the apply coupon box.

prizes.name: noel-leaming-power-bank
prizes.description: Something power bank keep your going during your end of year festivals
prizes.redeem_info: Show your phone the Shwoopian once you make him laugh to win your prize.

prizes.name: lime-unlock
prizes.redeem_info: Head over to the Lime app and enter your promo code inside the wallet.

prizes.name: 20-the-market-gift-card
prizes.redeem_info: Next time you make a purchase at  themarket.com/nz/ enter this code during checkout for $20 off

prizes.name: 30-ola-gift-card
prizes.description: Head out with weekend with your friends you deserve it. But don’t worry Ola’s got your next ride home
prizes.redeem_info: When you’re booking your ride in Ola. Copy this into the apply coupon box

prizes.name: 100-market-gift-card
prizes.redeem_info: Next time you make a purchase at  themarket.com/nz/ enter this code during checkout for $100 off

prizes.name: ue-megaboom
prizes.description: A portal, waterproof, dust proof speaker for all your summer adventure.
prizes.redeem_info: Congratulations you found it. Be the first to show our HQ to win

prizes.name: redbull-can
prizes.description: Perfect 250ml refresher to keep you focused and awake during the study season
prizes.redeem_info: Show your phone to the team at HQ and for a cold can of Redbull await …

surveys.question: When do you like to consume Red Bull the most?
